CommandSet.Name: CommandSet_en-us
CommandSet.Example: What is a graph for the second queueing theory model

Command.Name: showGraph
Command.Example: Show me the random graph for queueing theory model three

Command.Name: graphParams
Command.Example: What is a likelihood results for the model 2 with lambda 5 and mu 8 in queueing theory
Command.ListenFor: What is [a] likelihood [results] for [the] model one [1] [with] Lambda equal {vLambda} [and] Mu equal {vMu} [in]
What is [a] likelihood [results] for [the] model two [2] [with] Lambda equal {vLambda} [and] Mu equal {vMu} [in]
What is [a] likelihood [results] for [the] model three [3] [with] Lambda equal {vLambda} Mu equal {vMu} [and] V equal {vV} [in]
What is [a] likelihood [results] for [the] model four [4] [with] Lambda equal {vLambda} Mu equal {vMu} [and] V equal {vV} [in]
What is [a] likelihood [results] for [the] model five [5] [with] A equal {vLambda} Mu equal {vMu} V equal {vV} [and] N equal {vN} [in]
